name: Childhood Memories
description:
My submission to GGJ19.

Home means a lot of things to many people. To me it's is the memories made in a place that can make it a home. 

I have made three minigames placed in some settings from my childhood.

Double points if you can tell what Games I am trying to emulate.

Follow @theParsonater on twitter for game dev tweets and game dev related RTs. 

Follow @luke_the_parsons on Instagram for my Artwork seen in a game.

_Controles_
Move left and right with A and D
Jump With The Space Key
Shoot With the Shift key 

Alt+F4 to quit ;)
